title: 2025 Scholarship Recipients Announced
author: Renso Foundation
summary: We are proud to announce this year's scholarship recipients — eight outstanding students from diverse communities across Ontario who will receive support for post-secondary education.
body:
We are proud to announce this year's scholarship recipients — eight outstanding students from diverse communities across Ontario who will receive support for post-secondary education.

Each recipient was selected based on academic achievement, community involvement, and demonstrated financial need. This year's cohort represents seven different cultural backgrounds and four Ontario cities.

"Education is the foundation of everything we do," said the Foundation's Board Chair. "These young people are the future leaders of Canada's multicultural communities."
